sentences.en: Don’t take everything she says as gospel (= don’t believe everything she says ) .
sentences.cn: 别把她说的每句话都当真理。

sentences.en: Drink plenty of milk; that is my gospel.
sentences.cn: 多喝牛奶; 那是我的信条.

sentences.en: He takes his doctor's words as gospel.
sentences.cn: 他对医生的话深信不疑.

sentences.en: He wouldn't say this if it weren't the gospel truth.
sentences.cn: 要不是对此深信不疑，他不会说这样的话。

sentences.en: I didn't shirk my duties. I visited the sick and I preached the gospel.
sentences.cn: 我没有逃避责任。我探望了病人并传布了耶稣的福音和教义。

sentences.en: It taught only materialism, the gospel of mammon.
sentences.cn: 它只是宣扬金钱至上的物欲主义。

sentences.en: Law gets really excited when he talks about preaching the gospel.
sentences.cn: 罗医生行医三十馀年,专长外科,历任医院外科手术部主任及医务部主任等要职.

sentences.en: the Gospel according to St Luke
The leader said it, and that made it gospel.
sentences.cn: 领导说的话就是完全正确的.

sentences.en: The results were not to be taken as gospel.
sentences.cn: 别以为这些结果就一定是正确的。

sentences.en: They continue to preach their gospel of self - reliance .
sentences.cn: 他们继续倡导 自立 的信条.

sentences.en: They demonstrated that personal virtues could bring success; theirs was the gospel of work and thrift.
sentences.cn: 他们用行动来表明个人的美德能带来事业的成功, 他们的信条是勤劳和节俭.

sentences.en: This gospel truth was transformed into scientific law.
sentences.cn: 这段至理名言更变而为科学定律了.

sentences.en: We took the teacher's words as gospel.
sentences.cn: 我们把老师的话当作真理.

sentences.en: What he says is the gospel truth.
sentences.cn: 他所说的一切是无可置疑的.

sentences.en: What I'm telling you is gospel.
sentences.cn: 我告诉你的事是千真万确的.

sentences.en: You can take this as absolute gospel , ie should believe it.
sentences.cn: 你应该相信这是千真万确的.

words.tran_cn: （美）传福音的人，诵读福音书的人

trans.tran_cn: 传播福音的；福音赞美诗的
真理，信条，福音音乐，<新约>四福音书，原则
trans.tran_en: one of the four books in the Bible about Christ’s life
